code_value: Questions 1~2  You’ve made some new friends from England. You want to know how they celebrate Christmas. You ask them two questions about it.</br>Questions 3~4  You are in the supermarket and you want to buy an air conditioner. Ask the salesman two questions about it.
Questions 1~2  You’ve made some new friends from England. You want to know how they celebrate Christmas. You ask them two questions about it.
Questions 3~4  You are in the supermarket and you want to buy an air conditioner. Ask the salesman two questions about it.
